Class ContentLock.Static

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.cms.db.ContentLock.Static
  • Enclosing class:
    ContentLock

    public static class ContentLock.Static
extends Object
    ContentLock utility methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentLock.Static() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ContentLock lock(Object content, String aspect, Object newOwner)
      Tries to lock the given aspect of the given content and associate it to the given newOwner.
      static void unlock(Object content, String aspect, Object owner)
      Unlocks the given aspect of the given content if it's associated with the given owner.

      • ContentLock.Static

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        public static ContentLock lock(Object content,
               String aspect,
               Object newOwner)
        Tries to lock the given aspect of the given content and associate it to the given newOwner.
        Parameters:
        content - Can't be null.
        aspect - If null, it's equivalent to an empty string.
        newOwner - Can't be null.
        Returns:
        Never null.

      • unlock

        public static void unlock(Object content,
          String aspect,
          Object owner)
        Unlocks the given aspect of the given content if it's associated with the given owner.
        Parameters:
        content - Can't be null.
        aspect - If null, it's equivalent to an empty string.
        owner - If null, always unlocks.
